topic_title: Project 1 tds score not showing i

posts.content:
My project 1 marks are not showing in the dashboard. please check on that. i submitted my project on 16.02,2025
23f3000975@ds.study.iitm.ac.in  - my id

Project results have not been released yet. They have posponed everything.
Please look into this post.




Revised dates [TDS Jan 2025] Tools in Data Science


    A few updates on dates. Hope this eases pressure a little. 

Graded Assignment 6 moved from 14 Feb to 28 Feb 2025. Submission date moved from 9 Mar to 16 Mar 2025.
Project 2 moved from 21 Feb to 3 Mar 2025. Submission date moved from 17 Mar to 31 Mar 2025.
Graded Assignment 7 moved from 28 Feb to 7 Mar 2025. Submission date moved from 16 Mar to 26 Mar 2025.
Project 1 results will be released by 16 Mar 2025.

The TDS course page now reflects these dates.

Hi @carlton,
My Project 1 scores are not visible on the part, I have definitely submitted before the deadline and on the grades section - its coming as not submitted. I have mailed support team as well. Will it be possible to check the same in any manner.
Regards,
Ajit

No one has received their Project 1 scores yet. We are hoping to very soon announce preliminary results. (maybe in 24 hours or so). Depends how many bugs we get bitten by.
Kind regards
@carlton any updates on the Project 1 results?

We are releasing them today. You will get an email with lots of goodies in it 
Kind regards

carlton:

lots of goodies in it 


It is more frightening now…
If we failed in project1 then we will be awarded free marks in Project2 Please conform that @carlton at least give us some awards for our hard work (Summer special offer), what do you say?
I think something heavy is coming… But it’s 9:30, and nothing’s here yet. Taking their time, I see!
We have marks but we are sending you a package of items as well, for your benefit.

We have been waiting for you for a month… and our patience is wearing thin

posts.image_description:
The image shows a man leaning on the hood of a dark vehicle, possibly an SUV. He is dressed in an all-black ensemble, including a suit jacket and a shirt open at the collar. The man is wearing sunglasses, and has a well-groomed beard. He is holding a cigar between his fingers and has a tattoo on his hand. He is also wearing a watch and a necklace with a pendant.

The all-black attire, sunglasses, cigar, and the pose on the vehicle suggest a "tough guy" image, likely intended to convey power, wealth, and a sense of danger or mystery. The watch and jewelry add to the impression of affluence. The background is simple and mostly out of focus, which draws attention to the man and reinforces the image's focus on his persona.

posts.content: you are dealing with the wrong wrong person
sir its not showing anything for me, ive got no mail, what should i do?

Screenshot 2025-03-29 at 11.24.19 pm811×206 29.2 KB
You failed pre requisites check. Hence there is no evaluation email.
i.e. the score is 0 which will be pushed to dashboard on after 1/4/25
Only those that passed the pre requisite check got emails with scores.
posts.image_description:
Here's a concise description of the image:

The image displays a data table in a dark theme, likely from a software or system monitoring tool. The table tracks various properties associated with a specific email address (`22f3000118@ds.study.iitm.ac.in`) and their associated URLs/repositories.  The table columns include:

*   **email:** Email address used for the request: all requests are from the same email
*   **url:** URL or repository associated with each entry.
*   **result:** Status of the operation or check performed (OK or FAIL). This indicates whether the resource or process was successfully validated or not.
*   **type:** Type of check of operation.
*   **message:** Descriptive message explaining the result.

**Highlighted Topics:**

*   **Docker:** The table has entries that specifically check Docker-related components like "Docker" and "Dockerfile". The table results suggest attempts to validate the presence of DockerHub images and Dockerfiles in the associated repositories.
*   **GitHub Repositories:**  Multiple entries use a common GitHub URL structure (`https://github.com/22f3000118/Project-1`), indicating automated checks performed on a set of repositories or projects.
*   **Automated Validation:** The table layout indicates an automated system that verifies the state and properties of associated resources based on specific parameters.

**Parameters in Table**

*   **Repositories and URLs validation results** : Result and Message provide the complete validation status of the repository.
*   **Docker Image and DockerFile validation results** :  Result and Message show if public DockerHub image or Dockerfile exist on the repository.

my mail id: 23f2000798@ds.study.iitm.ac.in

No issue with your submission, you will get a good score.
Kind regards

Hi you were supposed to provide just one github link in the format specified. You failed to do that and therefore your submission was not evaluated.
Kind regards
